availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Hartford, Kentucky, merchant. Kentucky native. Son of Larkin Nall and Catharine A. Nall. Merchant in Hartford in 1860.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ohio County, District No. 1; Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ohio County, Town of Hartford, p. 197; Find A Grave, "William Henry Nall (1836 - 1868)," Memorial #125608837, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=125608837 (accessed September 21, 2017).
